summary: The defaultWorkerLogger sink fails to register automatically when using @temporalio/nyc-test-coverage's augmentWorkerOptions without explicitly setting WorkerOptions.sinks. Users must manually specify sinks: defaultSinks() as a workaround.
userImpact: Users testing with nyc-test-coverage cannot use workflow.log without manually configuring sinks, breaking the default logging experience.
rootCause: The defaultWorkerLogger sink registration is not automatically applied when augmentWorkerOptions is called without explicit sinks configuration.
workaround: Explicitly specify sinks: defaultSinks() in WorkerOptions before calling augmentWorkerOptions
keyQuote: The defaultWorkerLogger sink doesn't get automatically registered if WorkerOptions.sinks is not explicitly set before passing the WorkerOptions through @temporalio/nyc-test-coverage's augmentWorkerOptions.
